greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of 3*log(2) - Pi/2.
comment: This is the value of the series V(4,3) = lim_{n-> oo} V(4,3;n) with the partial sums V(4,3;n) = Sum_{k=0..n} 1/((k + 1)*(4*k + 3)) = Sum_{k=0..n} 1/A033991(k+1) = Sum_{k=0..n} (4/(4*k + 3) - 1/(k+1)) = A294516(n)/A294517(n).
reference: Max Koecher, Klassische elementare Analysis, Birkhäuser, Basel, Boston, 1987, pp. 189 - 193.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Nov 07 2017
